name: Life360, Inc.
description: Provider of a location and communication smartphone application intended to keep millions of families and close friends connected. The company's location and communication application addresses the immediate concerns of parents and rapidly redefining the safety and security landscape, enabling users to see where family members are on a private map, get help in an emergency and group chat.
one_liner: Provider of a location and communication smartphone application intended to keep millions of families and close friends connected. The company's location and communication application addresses the immediate concerns of parents and rapidly redefining the safety and security landscape, enabling users to see where family members are on a private map, get help in an emergency and group chat.
